description: Fig margarita calls for a simple syrup made from fresh figs, to which honey and a splash of lime juice are added. This cocktail has the perfect balance of sweetness and will surely please your guests.Additional Time: 3 to 24 hours
name: Fig Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Mix the sliced figs, lavender, and sugar in a mixing bowl. Muddle thoroughly.

recipeInstructions.name: Cover tightly and refrigerate for at least 3 hours, preferably overnight.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the mixture through a fine mesh strainer, pressing down as much as possible to extract as much liquid as feasible.
